scene.name: intro
scene.line: It's your friend again. And Coconut!

That's what we called him ... God, it's been a million years. He `did` work at the university, when I was an undergrad. He hung around the music department, but he was sort of a general technician: he'd fix the PA, run the soundboard during student theater productions, stuff like that.
Student theater productions? Is there something you want to tell me, Mimi?
Oh, no, I was just in the audience. Ha ha. They did some interesting stuff back then ... in the `paleolithic`.
So he would shake the rain-stick and crank the dry ice machine, huh? Why did you call him "Wise Will?"

He was chatty. He'd tell you all about the school's architecture, local history, county politics, gossip, folk remedies ... like they were all part of the same thing. I always wondered what happened to him.
Huh. Well, now you know: he's part of our data.
Yeah. Just another data point floating down the Echo ...
